roleset.name: to cause, impell, persuade
roleset.note: INDUCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'induce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from induce.01-v)
INDUCE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59. (from induce.02-v)

example.name: induce-v: transitive
example.text: The second patent describes bone morphogenetic protein , a substance that-2 [*T*-2] can induce formation of new cartilage .

example.name: Arg2 as a PP
example.text: Beijing lawmakers have called for jails to be built to house prostitutes and for severe punishment , including the death sentence , for anyone who-2 [*T*-2] induces or coerces women into prostitution .

example.name: induce-v: Arg2 as a VP
example.text: Mr. Neff says the stock market has lost some powerful driving forces , namely earnings growth and the `` LBO sweepstakes '' -- buy-out fever that-1 [*T*-1] induced investors to bid up whole groups of stocks , such as media and airlines .
example.arg: to bid up whole groups of stocks , such as media and airlines

example.name: induce-v: Medical: Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: When-1 should you induce a pregnant patient with hypertension *T*-1?

example.name: induce-v: Medical: all 3 args
example.text: When-1 should you induce a pregnant patient to labor *T*-1?

example.name: induction-n: Arg1, 2
example.text: Do these data proscribe induction of labor in a patient with a low tranverse uterine incision?
example.arg: in a patient with a low transverse uterine incision

roleset.name: placing into an office formally
roleset.note: INDUCT-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire. Frames file for 'induct' based on sentences in ULA written. No Verbnet entry; comparison with 'enroll.' (from induct.01-v)

role.descr: Inducted into what (Hall of Fame, etc.)

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: Quincy Jones, during his induction of Ray Charles into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, told a great story about how he and Ray used to be in a 1950s Seattle jazz band together providing music for strippers.
example.arg: into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame

example.name: passive
example.text: [Publications receiving a score of 10]-1 will be inducted *-1 into the Indis Hall of Fame.
example.arg: into the Indis Hall of Fame
